Question: This person influenced novelists such as Thomas Hardy, William Faulkner, and Charles Dickens.
Hints: Some scholars claim that members of this person's family were Catholics, at a time when Catholic practice was against the law.
The psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud drew on this personan psychology, in particular that of Hamlet, for his theories of human nature.
This person's first plays were written in the conventional style of the day.
